biocontainers.name: pantools
biocontainers.summary: Pantools is a disk-based java application for computational pan-genomics.

biotools.summary: PanTools is a pangenomic toolkit for comparative analysis of large number of genomes. It is developed in the Bioinformatics Group of Wageningen University, the Netherlands.

bioschemas.name: PanTools
bioschemas.summary: PanTools is a pangenomic toolkit for comparative analysis of large number of genomes. It is developed in the Bioinformatics Group of Wageningen University, the Netherlands.
